title: 我给服务器装上这个MOD后，一刷MOD里的东西就游戏崩溃
author: 疯狂小橙子
txt_content:
http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-61226-1-1.html这个MOD，我用的是MCPC，游戏能进，可是一刷就弹出这些错误提示：
---- Minecraft Crash Report ----
// Hi. I'm Minecraft, and I'm a crashaholic.

Time: 12-11-17 上午11:05
Description: Unexpected error

java.lang.NullPointerException

        at net.minecraft.client.Minecraft.run(Minecraft.java:779)
        at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)

Relevant Details:

- Operating System: Windows 7 (x86) version 6.1
- Java Version: 1.7.0_09, Oracle Corporation
- Java VM Version: Java HotSpot(TM) Client VM (mixed mode, sharing), Oracle Corporation

- LiteLoader Mods: 0 loaded mod(s)
- JVM Flags: 0 total; 
- AABB Pool Size: 1825 (102200 bytes; 0 MB) allocated, 410 (22960 bytes; 0 MB) used
- FML: MCP v7.19 FML v4.2.18.433 Minecraft Forge 6.0.1.355 Optifine OptiFine_1.4.2_HD_U_B5 8 mods loaded, 8 mods active
        mcp [Minecraft Coder Pack] (minecraft.jar) Unloaded->Constructed->Pre-initialized->Initialized->Post-initialized->Available
        FML [Forge Mod Loader] (coremods) Unloaded->Constructed->Pre-initialized->Initialized->Post-initialized->Available
        Forge [Minecraft Forge] (coremods) Unloaded->Constructed->Pre-initialized->Initialized->Post-initialized->Available

        mod_ReiMinimap [mod_ReiMinimap] ([1.4.2]ReiMinimap_v3.2_05汉化by大刘.zip) Unloaded->Constructed->Pre-initialized->Initialized->Post-initialized->Available
        mod_Blocks [mod_Blocks] (A180273196汉化一键快速建造1.44-1.4.2.zip) Unloaded->Constructed->Pre-initialized->Initialized->Post-initialized->Available

replies.author: shengjing1
replies.txt_content:
很明显Mod的介绍并没有说支持bukkit，你用MCPC怎么可能正常运行呢？
bukkit端mod现在很少的，除非mod介绍说明是支持bukkit不然都是不行的
你自己打开了应该是因为自己单机版mod是好的，但是服务端那边根本就没有对应的信息，那必然一拿东西就会出错

replies.author: 小黑人
replies.txt_content: 因为你的MOD要不就是坏了 要不就是装错 要不就是在服务器里你的服务端没这个MOD 求采纳
